SELECT tpo.purchase_order_seq, tpo.purchase_order_name, tpo.purchase_order_status, tpo.purchase_order_due_date, tpo.purchase_order_target_due_date, tpo.purchase_order_extended_price, tpo.purchase_order_total_quantity, tpo.purchase_order_note, tu.user_name, tc.client_name FROM tb_purchase_order tpo JOIN tb_user tu USING (user_seq) JOIN tb_client tc USING (client_seq) WHERE tpo.purchase_order_status != 'DELETE'
AND #{searchStartDate} <= tpo.purchase_order_target_due_date
AND #{searchEndDate} >= tpo.purchase_order_target_due_date
AND tc.client_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchName}, '%')
AND tpo.purchase_order_status IN
#{status}
ORDER BY tpo.purchase_order_seq desc
LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT tpoi.item_seq, tpoi.purchase_order_item_quantity, tpoi.purchase_order_item_price, tpoi.purchase_order_item_note, ti.item_name, ti.item_image_url FROM tb_purchase_order_item tpoi JOIN tb_item ti USING (item_seq) WHERE tpoi.purchase_order_seq = #{purchaseOrderSeq} ORDER BY tpoi.purchase_order_item_seq desc

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_purchase_order tpo JOIN tb_user tu USING (user_seq) JOIN tb_client tc USING (client_seq) WHERE tpo.purchase_order_status != 'DELETE'
AND #{searchStartDate} <= tpo.purchase_order_target_due_date
AND #{searchEndDate} >= tpo.purchase_order_target_due_date
AND tc.client_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchName}, '%')
AND tpo.purchase_order_status IN
#{status}

SELECT tpo.purchase_order_name, tpo.purchase_order_reg_date, tpo.purchase_order_total_quantity, tpo.purchase_order_extended_price, tpo.purchase_order_target_due_date, tpo.purchase_order_reg_date, tc.client_name, DATE_FORMAT(tpo.purchase_order_reg_date, '%Y-%m') as purchase_order_reg_month, IFNULL(SUM(tpo.purchase_order_extended_price), 0) as purchase_order_month_price, IFNULL(SUM(tpo.purchase_order_total_quantity), 0) as purchase_order_month_quantity FROM tb_purchase_order tpo JOIN tb_client tc USING (client_seq) WHERE tpo.purchase_order_status != 'DELETE'
AND #{searchStartDate} <= tpo.purchase_order_reg_date
AND #{searchEndDate} >= tpo.purchase_order_reg_date
AND tc.client_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchName}, '%')
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(tpo.purchase_order_reg_date, '%Y-%m'), tpo.purchase_order_reg_date WITH ROLLUP;

SELECT tpo.purchase_order_name, tpo.purchase_order_reg_date, DATE_FORMAT(tpo.purchase_order_reg_date, '%Y-%m') as purchase_order_reg_month, IFNULL(SUM(tpoi.purchase_order_item_extended_price), 0) as purchase_order_month_price, IFNULL(SUM(tpoi.purchase_order_item_quantity), 0) as purchase_order_month_quantity, ti.item_name, tpoi.purchase_order_item_extended_price, tpoi.purchase_order_item_quantity FROM tb_purchase_order tpo LEFT JOIN tb_purchase_order_item tpoi USING (purchase_order_seq) LEFT JOIN tb_item ti ON tpoi.item_seq = ti.item_seq WHERE tpo.purchase_order_status != 'DELETE' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM tb_purchase tp WHERE tp.purchase_order_seq = tpoi.purchase_order_seq )
AND #{searchStartDate} <= tpo.purchase_order_reg_date
AND #{searchEndDate} >= tpo.purchase_order_reg_date
AND ti.item_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchName}, '%')
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(tpo.purchase_order_reg_date, '%Y-%m'), tpo.purchase_order_reg_date, ti.item_name WITH ROLLUP;
